description: This stores comparison film change amounts.  It relates to table IMG_COMP_FILMS and they can be joined using the ORDER_ID and LINE columns.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FILM_CHNG_AMT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Contains the amount of change from a comparison film. The actual film or chart record can be obtained by joining this table to IMG_COMP_FILMS using the ORDER_ID and LINE columns.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


No Comparison


No Significant Change


Significant Change


Not Otherwise Specified
